PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: 59 The BHJ photoactive layer was prepared by spin - coating chlorobenzene solution of the polymer : PC71BM with weight ratio of 1 : 2 on the top of PEDOT : PSS layer without further treatment.

Let's think step by step.

| Property Value |
| --- |
| Chlorobenzene solution of the polymer | PC71BM |
| Weight ratio | 1 : 2 |
| PEDOT : PSS layer |  |

Note:

* "Chlorobenzene solution of the polymer" refers to the solvent and polymer mixture used to create the photoactive layer.
* "Weight ratio" refers to the ratio of the weight of the polymer to the weight of the solvent in the solution.
* "PEDOT : PSS layer" refers to the layer of PEDOT and PSS that was deposited before the spin-coating process.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Value of material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Sure, here's the updated table with the valid entities that refer to "Value of material property":

| Property Value |
| --- |
| 1 : 2 |
| PC71BM |

The weight ratio of 1 : 2 and the polymer PC71BM are the only entities in the paragraph that clearly refer to the value of a material property. The other entities, such as chlorobenzene solution and PEDOT : PSS layer, are not directly related to the value of a material property.
